pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiplier Data Envelopment Analysis and Cross Efficiency // Functions are provided for calculating efficiency using multiplier DEA (Data Envelopment Analysis): Measuring the efficiency of decision making units (Charnes et al., 1978 doi:10.1016/0377-2217(78)90138-8) and cross efficiency using single and two-phase approach. In addition, it includes some datasets for calculating efficiency and cross efficiency.
